p: Secondly, 20 protein–protein interactions between ASFV and swine were obtained from the literature. This was achieved by firstly searching the PubMed database by the key word “ASFV” in the title or abstract on 29 December 2018, which resulted in 630 abstracts. Then, each abstract was manually screened based on whether it contained protein–protein interactions between ASFV and swine, and 117 abstracts were retained. Finally, the full texts of the manuscripts corresponding to these abstracts were read carefully and 20 extra protein–protein interactions between ASFV and swine were compiled from these articles.
